data.description:
Within Mazer’s groundbreaking virtual world, you can own a private penthouse in one of an ever-evolving network of Cyber Cities or set up an online headquarters for your business. Mazer’s fully customizable, private virtual spaces give you complete control and almost unlimited opportunities for personalization, making them the perfect place for both personal and business use. Set up your space to suit your specific needs and invite whoever you want to enjoy it with you. 
Build bespoke XR solutions for your business or use your space to host engaging and professional business meetings, show off new products using Mazer’s state-of-the-art digital twin technology, or simply enjoy the exhilarating entertainment facilities in your virtual penthouse with friends and family. 
Enter Mazer World today to discover a new future!

changelog.change_log: New features for Mazer Trainer. Minor bugfixes.

1.  Emoticons: A wide range of new emoticons to express yourself better in messages and chats.
2.  Dry-Erase Board: An interactive dry-erase board feature, perfect for brainstorming sessions and quick notes.
3.  Photo Board: A new photo board where you can easily pin and organize your favorite pictures.
4.  Streamers: Enhanced support for streamers with new tools and features to improve live streaming experiences.
5.  Movie Players: Integrated movie players to watch and share videos seamlessly within the platform.
6.  Video 360 Trainings: New 360-degree video training modules for immersive learning experiences.
7.  Standup Bomb: A new tool designed to make standup meetings more engaging and efficient.
8.  Pictures: Customizable picture features to personalize and decorate your environment.
9.  Captions: Enhanced captioning options for better communication and accessibility.
10. Replaceable Logos: New replaceable logo options to personalize and brand your spaces.
11. New Spaces: Introduction of new spaces to better organize and collaborate on various projects and activities.

New spaces for Comarch.
New features for PKO BP.
New colors of marker, improved NFT galery UI, improved startup scene

New features:
NFT frames for gallery.

Fixes:
Avatar configurator bugfixes

New functionalities:
NFT Frames, priviledges management for users, avatar configurator improvements

Fixes:
Performance fixes
Fixes and new clothes for avatars
